attributes.action: remove lord mawhiiney as the football league chairman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United started last season on a 15 point deduction and this season Luton Town start on minus 30, with other clubs likely to get a deduction in thje rear future, this is not fair on the fans who pay good money to watch fair football played on a lvev playing field, to cheat us out of a fair competition is a disgrace. real football for real fans is the slogan of the league but we dont get real football, leeds earnt promotion last season but didnt get it, and Luton need a miracle, i call for lord mawhinney to go

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
